Body: Description: Could you please uninstall endpoint protector. we forget the login password to unistall the agent .so could you please take remote session
What We've Learned Updated: Client forgot the uninstall password and they require to remote in and uninstall the EPP locally.
Next Steps Updated: Will have to remote in to assist maybe with changing the password.
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici
Invitation updated. Attendees: Marian Ilies, Adrian Draghici, Lokesh N

What We've Learned Updated: Connected remote with Lokesh to assist further alongside Adrian and they seem to have a problem with uninstalling the app.
Also, the password they were referring to in the description was the uninstall password.
We went on and gave them the zap tool as it was only for one device and then deleted the tool through shift+delete.
After the restart, Lokesh confirmed the EPP was removed successfully.
Closing ticket as resolved.
